text: 瑞雪兆丰年 is a Chinese idiom that can translate into “a timely snow promises a good harvest”.小红：我好兴奋啊！好激动啊!小明：发生什么事情了？让你这么激动。小红：外面下雪了！下雪了！今年的第一场雪。小明：真的吗？我也要去看看。小红：等雪停了，咱们一起去堆雪人，好吗？小明：当然可以了，我要为雪人做一个可爱的鼻子，再准备一顶帽子。小红：太好了。你听说过吗？瑞雪兆丰年，明年一定会大丰收的。小红：I’m very excited! So excited! 小明：What has happened to make you so excited? 小红：It’s snowing outside! Snowing! This year’s first spell of snow. 小明：Really? I want to see too. 小红：Let’s wait for the snow to stop. We can go build snowmen together, ok? 小明：Of course! I will make a cute nose for the snowman, and then prepare a hat. 小红：Excellent. Have you heard, a timely snow promises a good harvest.
